section.name: CVS instructions for all modules
section.p: This instructions are general, check the module documentation if you need concrete instructions.

ul.li: acegisecurity (this will check out all modules)

subsection.name: Anonymous Access with Maven
subsection.p: This project's CVS repository can be checked out through anonymous (pserver) CVS with the following instruction on a single line.

subsection.name: Anonymous SVN Access
subsection.p: This project's SVN repository can be checked out through anonymous SVN with the following instruction set.

subsection.name: Nightly Snapshots
subsection.p: If you'd prefer not to use SVN directly, please see our downloads page for nightly snapshots.
